```{ojs}
//| echo: false

import { WMR2D } from  '../_lib/WMR2D/dist/wmr2d.js';

{
    function loop(now) {

        if ( ! prevTime) prevTime = now;
        let dt = now - prevTime;
        prevTime = now;

        wmr.updatePositionClosedForm(dt / 1000.0);
        wmr.render(true);

        requestAnimationFrame(loop);

    }

    let prevTime = 0.0;
    let wmr = new WMR2D( 'wmr-canvas' );

    requestAnimationFrame(loop);

    return html`<div></div>`;
}
```
